item.name: Input 1 Alarm
item.description: the state of the input, which is considered to be alarm

item.name: Input 1 State
item.description: current state of the input

item.name: Input 2 Alarm
item.description: the state of the input, which is considered to be alarm

item.name: Input 2 State
item.description: current state of the input

item.name: Port 1 AutoRestart Status
item.description: State of special function 'AutoRestart'. 'normal' - no error, 'noLink' - no link activity on port, 'noPing' - no answer to ping, 'lowSpeed' - low speed on port

trigger.name: Port 1 AutoRestart: low speed on port
trigger.description: Port 1 AutoRestart: low speed on port. Низкая скорость на порту 1.

trigger.name: Port 1 AutoRestart: no link on port
trigger.description: Port 1 AutoRestart: no link on port. Нет линка на порту 1.

trigger.name: Port 1 AutoRestart: no Ping response on port
trigger.description: Port 1 AutoRestart: no Ping response on port. Устройство на порту 1 не отвечает на Ping.

item.name: Port 1 ComfortStart complete
item.description: State of special function 'ComfortStart' on port. true - ComfortStart is ready, false- ComfortStart in processing

item.description: State of special function 'AutoRestart'. 'normal' - no error, 'noLink' - no link activity on port, 'noPing' - no answer to ping, 'lowSpeed' - low speed on port

trigger.description: Port 2 AutoRestart: no link on port. Нет линка на порту 2.

trigger.description: Port 2 AutoRestart: no Ping response on port. Устройство на порту 2 не отвечает на Ping.

item.name: UPS Power Source
item.description: "This variable shows the power source for switch. 'Battery'(1) - power source is battery,no external AC voltage. 'AC'(2) - power source is external AC voltage,normal operation."

trigger.name: Power Source is Battery

item.name: UPS Status
item.description: true - UPS module is connected to switch

item.name: UPS Battery Voltage
item.description: "This variable shows battery voltage. This option only for switches with UPS module."

trigger.name: {HOSTNAME} has just been restarted
Battery voltage is low

trigger.expression: (last(/PSW-2G8F-Plus-UPS-Box/input1_alarm)=1 and last(/PSW-2G8F-Plus-UPS-Box/input1_state)=1) or (last(/PSW-2G8F-Plus-UPS-Box/input1_alarm)=2 and last(/PSW-2G8F-Plus-UPS-Box/input1_state)=2) or (last(/PSW-2G8F-Plus-UPS-Box/input1_alarm)=3 and last(/PSW-2G8F-Plus-UPS-Box/input1_state,#2)=1 and last(/PSW-2G8F-Plus-UPS-Box/input1_state)=2) or (last(/PSW-2G8F-Plus-UPS-Box/input1_alarm)=3 and last(/PSW-2G8F-Plus-UPS-Box/input1_state,#2)=2 and last(/PSW-2G8F-Plus-UPS-Box/input1_state)=1)
trigger.name: Input 1 is active
trigger.description: Вход 1 (Input 1) активен!

trigger.expression: (last(/PSW-2G8F-Plus-UPS-Box/input2_alarm)=1 and last(/PSW-2G8F-Plus-UPS-Box/input2_state)=1) or (last(/PSW-2G8F-Plus-UPS-Box/input2_alarm)=2 and last(/PSW-2G8F-Plus-UPS-Box/input2_state)=2) or (last(/PSW-2G8F-Plus-UPS-Box/input2_alarm)=3 and last(/PSW-2G8F-Plus-UPS-Box/input2_state,#2)=1 and last(/PSW-2G8F-Plus-UPS-Box/input2_state)=2) or (last(/PSW-2G8F-Plus-UPS-Box/input2_alarm)=3 and last(/PSW-2G8F-Plus-UPS-Box/input2_state,#2)=2 and last(/PSW-2G8F-Plus-UPS-Box/input2_state)=1)
trigger.name: Tamper is active
trigger.description: Датчик вскрытия активен!
